document_data.name: Matabo Vine
document_data.mainbody: '''Matabo vines''' were carnivorous plants that grew in the jungles of [[Chult]].{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|26}}
document_data.Description: Matabo vines were semi-sentient and covered in [[poison]]ous barbs.{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|18}} Creatures that came within {{SI|10|feet|long=yes}} of matabo vines found the plants lashing out at them, attempting to restrain and poison them in order to "drink" their blood.

Ecology.Uses: Some gladiatorial events in the [[Grand Coliseum]] of [[Port Nyanzaru]] were made more deadly by setting them inside cages covered in matabo vines.

document_data.History: During the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], matabo vines could be found growing on the jungled ridge at the furthest edge of the [[Malar's Throat]] ward of Port Nyanzaru.
